channel.title: Pixelblaze on Pi4J
channel.description: Recent content in Pixelblaze on Pi4J

item.title: Pixelblaze Output Expander
item.description: GITHUB PROJECT: https://github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-jbang PixelblazeOutputExpander.java One of the most “fancy” electronic components is definitely a LED strip. It’s really cool to control a long strip of lights with only a few lines of code… But, there is a problem. The timings of the signals is crucial to reliably control these strips. Both Python and Java on a Raspberry Pi can struggle with these timings as they are running on Linux, a non-real-time operating system.
